TopicTitle: Can you make a part that has parameters influenced by the part directly below it?

Articles.Content:
So I'm trying to make a mod that basically adds an engine that is 'cut in half'-- as in, the fuel pump/combustion chamber and exhaust bell are two different parts, and depending on what combination of pump/combustion chamber and bell you use, the engine changes performance.

 

Does anybody know if this is possible?

If not, I'll just use the tried and true method of putting a slider on the VAB right-click menu.

Thanks!
Yeah, the parts know their parent & child parts. You'll need an actual partmodule.

Just now, Van Disaster said:

Yeah, the parts know their parent & child parts. You'll need an actual partmodule.

So I'd need to write a plugin?
I'm not aware of anything existing which would let you do generic modifications to nearby parts, so probably yes.
